goals__remit:
ECCH is the representative professional platform for the homeopathy profession in Europe. It unites the national professional associations of homeopaths in European countries in order that they can exchange knowledge and experience with the aim of establishing high common standards for homeopathic treatment of patients across Europe.  
ECCH assists its national members to establish the legal rights of homeopaths to practise where these rights do not already exist and for all European citizens to have access to professional homeopathic treatment. 
ECCH also engages in work to maintain homeopathy professionals' access to the full range of homeopathic medicinal products necessary for effective homeopathic treatment in all European countries.
